metadata.title: CVE-2021-30744 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Description: A cross-origin issue with iframe elements was addressed withimproved tracking of security origins. This issue is fixed in tvOS 14.6,iOS 14.6 and iPadOS 14.6, Safari 14.1.1, macOS Big Sur 11.4, watchOS 7.5.Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to universal cross sitescripting.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in xenial is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
qtwebkit-source package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
